entry.title: WRATH WINGS T-SHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-shirt
Price: 5800.00

Description

THE BLUORNG WRATH WINGS T-SHIRT VISUALISES THE DRAGON CREATED BY THE EVIL WIZARD. WITH SCREEN PRINT GRAPHICS, THE T-SHIRT HAS A BOLD DESIGN ON THE FRONT THAT WILL HELP YOU STAND OUT WITH CONFIDENCE.

WITH A ROUND NECK AND SHORT SLEEVES, IT’S A COMFORTABLE, RELAXED-FIT ESSENTIAL FOR YOUR EVERYDAY OUTFITS. FEATURES A VINTAGE-INSPIRED DISTRESSED TREATMENT AT HEMS AND SLEEVES.

Details

100% Cotton

Weight - 260 GSM

Screen Print Graphics

Distressed Nibbling Details

Reverse Wash only

shipping

Packed within 24 hours.

Free delivery Pan-India.

Dispatches Next Day

Vendor: Bluorng

Price: 5200.00

Description

BLUORNG’s red oversized t-shirt is crafted from premium cotton at 260 GSM, giving it a soft yet durable feel. The bold front graphic is screen-printed for lasting quality, while the signature oversized fit adds a relaxed streetwear edge. A luxury essential that combines comfort, impact, and everyday wearability.
